DOC.brief_summary: This study aim direct comparison ProHance ( 0.1 mmol/kg ) validate comparator Gadovist/Gadavist ( 0.1 mmol/kg ) crossover intra-individual design subject brain tumor confirm identical overall technical diagnostic performance two MR contrast agent .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Prohance® With Gadovist®/Gadavist™ Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) Brain
DOC.detailed_description: Adult patient give two MRI exam , one injection ProHance ( 0.1 mmol/kg ) one injection Gadovist/Gadavist ( 0.1 mmol/kg ) . The exam perform identical equipment image parameter order two exam randomize 2-14 day first second MRI exam . Image data evaluate 3 expert neuroradiologist blind agent administer patient clinical data .
DOC.criteria: Are schedule undergo MRI Are willing undergo two MRI procedure within 14 day Have confirm highly suspect brain disease likely enhance determine follow : Clinical/neurological symptomatology ; Diagnostic testing , CT previous MRI examination ; Have previous brain surgery evaluate recurrence . Are pregnant lactate female . Exclude possibility pregnancy : test site institution within 24 hour prior start investigational product administration ; history ( i.e. , tubal ligation hysterectomy ) ; post menopausal minimum 1 year without menses Have know allergy one ingredients investigational product , history hypersensitivity metal Have congestive heart failure ( class IV accord classification New York Heart Association ; see Appendix A ) Have suffer stroke within year Have receive schedule receive contrast medium 24 hour precede 24 hour follow Exam 1 , 24 hour precede 24 hour follow Exam 2 Have receive schedule receive investigational compound and/or medical device within 30 day admission present study , 24 hour postadministration second investigational product . Have moderatetosevere renal impairment , define GFR/eGFR < 45 mL/min . Have previously enter study Have receive schedule one following : Surgery within three week prior first examination two examination Initiation steroid therapy two examination Radiosurgery two examination Have contraindication MRI pacemaker , magnetic material ( i.e. , surgical clip ) condition would preclude proximity strong magnetic field . Are suffer severe claustrophobia
DOC.keyword: Have confirm highly suspect brain disease
